mapper.insert: insert into teacher_info (username, password, sex, name, title, avatar, role,field_id) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{name}, #{title}, #{avatar}, #{role},#{fieldId})
mapper.update: update teacher_info set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, name = #{name}, title = #{title}, avatar = #{avatar}, role=#{role}, field_id=#{fieldId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select teacher_info.*,speciality.name as specialityName from teacher_info left join speciality on speciality.id = teacher_info.field_id
and teacher_info.username like concat ('%',#{username},'%')
order by teacher_info.id desc
